Keywords: Brotherhood of Mutants , Dark Avengers , Dark X-Men , Horsemen , Monster , Warrior , X-Factor , X-Men
Real Name: Akihiro
Special Powers
MURAMASA-COATED CLAWS: When Daken hits, give each hit character a Poisoned token. // Characters with Poisoned tokens can't be healed and can't use STOP for the rest of the game, even if this ability is lost.
WON'T SEE ME COMING: Charge, Sidestep, Stealth. When Daken uses Charge while he occupies hindering terrain, he does not halve speed.

Comments
August 25, 2021
machineman
My favorite from this set. I’ll probably have a hard time not getting this guy on every Brotherhood of Mutants, Dark Avengers, Dark X-Men, Horsemen, Monster, Warrior, X-Factor, and X-Men team I build for a long time
August 12, 2021
Goop
Really like this guys ability to shut down healing and stop clicks. At 70pts he is a bit weak on the defense side unfortunately. He might be better as a sideline piece you can swap in with Prof X/Magneto when you see what you are facing. Overall though he's an awesome answer to a lot of OP pieces out there.
June 18, 2021
dasaul29
Best part...he does not need to deal damage for the poisoned token to be given, just hit. So if his blades does nothing, that is okay. Dark Avenger time for sure. I can't wait to use him!
June 2, 2021
fastcat99
uh...wow. That's mean. If he has a cool sculpt (like the LE, NOT the UC) then I'm sold. I'm ready for some Dark Avenger teams to get back into the game.
June 2, 2021
Hesster56
Took me a second to understand his Charge special with the new rules, but it's just sick. Fling him out with TK. Sidestep into Hindering. Charge for 9 squares. And your opponent can kiss their STOP clicks goodby.
